description: Request message for updating a group.

^(allowMissing)$.description:
If set to true, and the group is not found, a new group will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

^(updateMask)$.description: The list of fields to update.

allow_missing.description:
If set to true, and the group is not found, a new group will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

group.description:
The group's `name` field is used to identify the group to update.
 Format: groups/{email}
group.title: The group to update.

update_mask.description: The list of fields to update.

title: Update Group Request
